title.rendered: Kid’s Corner Starts Next Week! + Now Hiring

content.rendered:
Kid’s Corner Starts Next Week!

June will kick off our Kid’s Corner summer reading events at Macon and Warner Robins. It is always a FREE event and we always have great readers, yummy snacks, and a ton of giveaways.

The events start next Tuesday and Thursday.

Now Hiring!

Bring Us Your Required Reading List

Poolside Page-Turners

Whether you like romance or sci-fi, you’re “shore” to find just the right books for your beach bag at Gottwals Books.

excerpt.rendered: June will kick off our Kid’s Corner summer reading events at Macon and Warner Robins. It is always a FREE event and we always have great readers, yummy snacks, and a ton of giveaways.
